name: Grand Crystal Ballroom
description: A majestic ballroom adorned with crystal chandeliers, marble flooring, and high ceilings. Designed for unforgettable weddings, gala dinners, and luxury banquets.

name: Skyview Rooftop Lounge
description: A sophisticated rooftop venue with panoramic skyline views, ideal for private receptions and upscale cocktail events under the stars.

name: Executive Summit Boardroom
description: A luxurious and fully equipped boardroom for executive meetings, strategy sessions, and VIP client presentations.

name: The Rose Garden Courtyard
description: A serene outdoor courtyard surrounded by manicured gardens, perfect for intimate wedding ceremonies and elegant garden parties.

name: Velvet Lounge
description: A plush and modern indoor venue featuring velvet seating, mood lighting, and a sleek bar â€“ ideal for social mixers and private parties.

name: Crystal Foyer Gallery
description: An elegant pre-function space with art displays and natural lighting, ideal for welcome receptions, cocktail hours, or exhibitions.
